TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAdvice extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SAML 判斷提示中的 `<saml:Advice>` 項目是 SAML 權杖的擴充點。 其中一個示範如何使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> 類別的範例，就是提供關於發出該 SAML 判斷提示之 SAML 授權單位的支援資訊。 這項支援資訊可以採用 SAML 判斷提示的格式，或是成為 SAML 判斷提示的參考，分別由 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 以及 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 屬性來表示。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫這個建構函式，而且該執行個體在序列化為 XML (透過呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> 方法) 之前並未遭到修改，則 `<saml:Advice>` 方法會產生一個空的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.WriteXml%2A> 項目。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> assertions) cil managed
Public Sub New (assertions As IEnumerable(Of SamlAssertion))

Docs.param: An of type that contains SAML assertions that provides additional information for a SAML assertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified collection of SAML assertions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `assertions` 參數的項目會加入到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 屬性中。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> references) cil managed
Public Sub New (references As IEnumerable(Of String))

Docs.param: An of type that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `references` 參數的項目會加入到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 屬性中。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> references, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> assertions) cil managed
Public Sub New (references As IEnumerable(Of String), assertions As IEnumerable(Of SamlAssertion))

Docs.param: An of type that contains a collection of references to SAML assertions that provide additional information on a SAML assertion.
An of type that contains SAML assertions that provide additional information for a SAML assertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified collections of SAML assertions and SAML assertion references.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `references` 參數的項目會加入到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 屬性中。
`assertions` 參數的項目會加入到 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 屬性中。

Docs.exception: contains a element. -or- contains a element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssertionIdReferences As IList(Of String)

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of references to SAML assertions.
Docs.value: 型別為 的 ，其中包含提供 SAML 判斷提示之其他資訊的 SAML 判斷提示參考集合。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 屬性會對應到 `<saml:AssertionIDReference>` 項目的 `<saml:Advice>` 子項目，該項目已定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 規格中。
當 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> 屬性值是 `true` 時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 屬性傳回的集合就會是唯讀的。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Assertions As IList(Of SamlAssertion)

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of SAML assertions.
Docs.value: 型別為 的 ，其中包含提供 SAML 判斷提示之其他資訊的 SAML 判斷提示。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.AssertionIdReferences%2A> 屬性會對應到 `<saml:Assertion>` 項目的 `<saml:Advice>` 子項目，該項目已定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 1.1 規格中。
當 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> 屬性值是 `true` 時，從 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.Assertions%2A> 屬性傳回的集合就會是唯讀的。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
Docs.value: 如果這個執行個體的屬性是唯讀的，則為 ，否則為 。 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice> 類別的這個執行個體變成唯讀的，此時會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAdvice.IsReadOnly%2A> 屬性會設定為 `true`。

Docs.param: An to read the XML element.
A that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
A that determines the security token that created the digital signature for SAML assertions that contain this XML element.
Docs.summary: Reads the XML element using the specified XML reader.
Docs.exception: The element does not conform to the XML schema for the element.
